00043 // VectorFunction is a generic interface used for numeric derivative calculations.
00044 // Clients implement the pure virtual functions, and the calculations are handled automatically
00045 
00046 
00047 template<typename value_type>
00048 class VectorFunction
00049 {
00050     public:
00051 
00052     virtual unsigned int argumentCount() const = 0;
00053     virtual unsigned int valueCount() const = 0;
00054     virtual ublas::vector<value_type> operator()(ublas::vector<double> x) const = 0;
00055 
00056     ublas::matrix<value_type> differenceQuotient(ublas::vector<double> x, double delta) const;
00057     void printDifferenceQuotientSequence(ublas::vector<double> x,
00058                                          std::ostream& os) const;
00059 
00060     protected:
00061     virtual ~VectorFunction(){}
00062 };
00063 
00064 
00065 template<typename value_type>
00066 ublas::matrix<value_type> VectorFunction<value_type>::differenceQuotient(ublas::vector<double> x, double delta) const
00067 {
00068     ublas::matrix<value_type> result(argumentCount(), valueCount());
00069     result.clear();
00070     for (unsigned int i=0; i<argumentCount(); i++)
00071     {
00072         ublas::vector<double> x2(x);
00073         x2(i) += delta;
00074         row(result, i) = ((*this)(x2)-(*this)(x))/delta;
00075     }
00076     return result;
00077 }
00078 
00079 
00080 template<typename value_type>
00081 void VectorFunction<value_type>::printDifferenceQuotientSequence(ublas::vector<double> x,
00082                                                                  std::ostream& os) const
00083 {
00084         using namespace std;
00085 
00086     for (double delta=.1; delta>1e-9; delta/=10)
00087     {
00088         os << scientific << setprecision(1) << "[delta: " << delta << "] ";
00089         os.unsetf(std::ios::scientific);
00090         os << setprecision(8) << differenceQuotient(x, delta) << endl;
00091     }
00092 }
00093 
00094 
00095 // Adaptors from ParametrizedFunction and its derivative, error, and error-derivative functions to
00096 // implement the VectorFunction interface.
00097 
00098 
00099 template<typename value_type>
00100 class ParametrizedFunctionSlice : public VectorFunction<value_type>
00101 {
00102     public:
00103     ParametrizedFunctionSlice(const ParametrizedFunction<value_type>& f, double x)
00104     :   f_(f), x_(x)
00105     {}
00106 
00107     virtual unsigned int argumentCount() const {return f_.parameterCount();}
00108     virtual unsigned int valueCount() const {return 1;}
00109 
00110     virtual ublas::vector<value_type> operator()(ublas::vector<double> p) const
00111     {
00112         ublas::vector<value_type> result(1);
00113         result(0) = f_(x_, p);
00114         return result;
00115     }
00116 
00117     private:
00118     const ParametrizedFunction<value_type>& f_;
00119     double x_;
00120 };
00121 
00122 
00123 template<typename value_type>
00124 class ParametrizedDerivativeSlice : public VectorFunction<value_type>
00125 {
00126     public:
00127     ParametrizedDerivativeSlice(const ParametrizedFunction<value_type>& f, double x)
00128     :   f_(f), x_(x)
00129     {}
00130 
00131     virtual unsigned int argumentCount() const {return f_.parameterCount();}
00132     virtual unsigned int valueCount() const {return f_.parameterCount();}
00133 
00134     virtual ublas::vector<value_type> operator()(ublas::vector<double> p) const
00135     {
00136         return f_.dp(x_,p);
00137     }
00138 
00139     private:
00140     const ParametrizedFunction<value_type>& f_;
00141     double x_;
00142 };
00143 
00144 
00145 template<typename value_type>
00146 class AdaptedErrorFunction : public VectorFunction<double> // double: error functions are real-valued
00147 {
00148     public:
00149     AdaptedErrorFunction(const typename ParametrizedFunction<value_type>::ErrorFunction& e)
00150     :   e_(e)
00151     {}
00152 
00153     virtual unsigned int argumentCount() const {return e_.parameterCount();}
00154     virtual unsigned int valueCount() const {return 1;}
00155 
00156     virtual ublas::vector<double> operator()(ublas::vector<double> p) const
00157     {
00158         ublas::vector<double> result(1);
00159         result(0) = e_(p);
00160         return result;
00161     }
00162 
00163     private:
00164     const typename ParametrizedFunction<value_type>::ErrorFunction& e_;
00165 };
00166 
00167 
00168 template<typename value_type>
00169 class AdaptedErrorDerivative : public VectorFunction<double>
00170 {
00171     public:
00172     AdaptedErrorDerivative(const typename ParametrizedFunction<value_type>::ErrorFunction& e)
00173     :   e_(e)
00174     {}
00175 
00176     virtual unsigned int argumentCount() const {return e_.parameterCount();}
00177     virtual unsigned int valueCount() const {return e_.parameterCount();}
00178 
00179     virtual ublas::vector<double> operator()(ublas::vector<double> p) const
00180     {
00181         return e_.dp(p);
00182     }
00183 
00184     private:
00185     const typename ParametrizedFunction<value_type>::ErrorFunction& e_;
00186 };

00188 
00189 // Numeric derivative calculations for ParametrizedFunction and associated ErrorFunction.
00190 
00191 
00192 template<typename value_type>
00193 void testDerivatives(const ParametrizedFunction<value_type>& f,
00194                      double x,
00195                      const ublas::vector<double>& p,
00196                      std::ostream* os = 0,
00197                      double delta = 1e-7,
00198                      double epsilon = 1e-4)
00199 {
00200         using namespace std;
00201 
00202     if (os)
00203     {
00204         *os << "x: " << x << endl;
00205         *os << "p: " << p << endl;
00206     }
00207 
00208     if (os) *os << "f.dp: " << f.dp(x,p) << endl;
00209     ParametrizedFunctionSlice<value_type> slice(f,x);
00210     if (os) slice.printDifferenceQuotientSequence(p, *os);
00211 
00212     ublas::matrix<value_type> dp(f.dp(x,p).size(),1);
00213     column(dp,0) = f.dp(x,p);
00214     unit_assert_matrices_equal(dp, slice.differenceQuotient(p,delta), epsilon);
00215 
00216     if (os) *os << "f.dp2: " << f.dp2(x,p) << endl;
00217     ParametrizedDerivativeSlice<value_type> derivativeSlice(f,x);
00218     if (os) derivativeSlice.printDifferenceQuotientSequence(p, *os);
00219 
00220     unit_assert_matrices_equal(f.dp2(x,p), derivativeSlice.differenceQuotient(p,delta), epsilon);
00221 }
00222 
00223 
00224 template<typename value_type>
00225 void testDerivatives(const typename ParametrizedFunction<value_type>::ErrorFunction& e,
00226                      const ublas::vector<double>& p,
00227                      std::ostream* os = 0,
00228                      double delta = 1e-7,
00229                      double epsilon = 1e-4)
00230 {
00231         using namespace std;
00232 
00233     if (os) *os << "p: " << p << endl;
00234 
00235     if (os) *os << "e.dp: " << e.dp(p) << endl;
00236     AdaptedErrorFunction<value_type> adapted(e);
00237     if (os) adapted.printDifferenceQuotientSequence(p, *os);
00238 
00239     ublas::matrix<value_type> dp(e.dp(p).size(), 1);
00240     column(dp,0) = e.dp(p);
00241     unit_assert_matrices_equal(dp, adapted.differenceQuotient(p,delta), epsilon);
00242 
00243     if (os) *os << "e.dp2: " << e.dp2(p) << endl;
00244     AdaptedErrorDerivative<value_type> adaptedDerivative(e);
00245     if (os) adaptedDerivative.printDifferenceQuotientSequence(p, *os);
00246 
00247     unit_assert_matrices_equal(e.dp2(p), adaptedDerivative.differenceQuotient(p,delta), epsilon);
00248 }
